name: arabic-pdf-translator
description: Arabic PDF OCR and translation with dual-mode architecture. Pipeline mode: multi-engine OCR (EasyOCR primary, Tesseract + PaddleOCR optional) with 7-stage Arabic-tuned preprocessing, 4-method ensemble translation (Claude, Google Cloud, DeepL, OpenAI), and Claude-as-judge quality evaluation. Native mode: Claude vision + translation -- fully functional without Python dependencies or API keys. Auto-selects best available mode. Includes /verify-arabic-setup for installation diagnostics.
